subSubSection.paragraph: Northern and south-eastern Pacific Ocean with genetic records from the following localities: United States: Monterey Bay, California (type locality); United States: Aleutian Islands, Alaska; Japan: off Sanriku; Chile: southeast of Stockman Guyot, Salas y Gomez Ridge, south-eastern Pacific (this study).
